example.name: cause to come about
example.text: It's precisely the kind of product that-1 *trace*-1 's recreated the municipal landfill monster.
example.note: Yes, I know, semantically the trace should point to "product" not"kind", but syntactically it has to point to "kind", and sinceTreebank totally mucked up the syntax for all these kinds ofconstructions, we have to follow what they did.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'recreate' based on transformation of 'create' frames. No actual examples examined.
